Key Match Events: Jayson Tatum made a selfless pass to Sam Hauser, who rose up from the right corner and gave Boston the lead late in the fourth quarter
Post-Match Reflections: Jayson Tatum expressed pride in his team's effort after the comeback win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Boston Celtics shot a season-low 26.4 percent from deep
Others: Al Horford made a massive tie-breaking triple in overtime that gave Boston the lead for good
